availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, physician. Halifax County, Virginia, native. Married to Elizabeth Holland. Married to Ella Vallandingham Holland on in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on February 28, 1861. Father of Robert A. Holland, Mary E. Holland, Henry L. Holland, and James W. Holland. Physician in Jefferson County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1850. Physician in Jefferson County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860.
